biotools.summary: OncMTR stands for missense tolerance ratio specific for cancer-driving mutations. It is designed to predict cancer-causing somatic mutations. The lower the OncMTR score, the less tolerant the region for cancer-causing somatic mutations. Positions with scores below -0.05 are considered missense intolerant regions.

bioschemas.name: OncMTR
bioschemas.summary: OncMTR stands for missense tolerance ratio specific for cancer-driving mutations. It is designed to predict cancer-causing somatic mutations. The lower the OncMTR score, the less tolerant the region for cancer-causing somatic mutations. Positions with scores below -0.05 are considered missense intolerant regions.
